code: import backend from"lib/backend";/* USED BY THE APP FILE */var ACTIONS={login:function login(user){return{type:"LOGIN",user:user};},logout:function logout(){return{type:"LOGOUT"};}},REDUCER=function REDUCER(state,action){switch(action.type){case"LOGIN":setTimeout(function(){return window.location.reload();},action.user.timeOut);return action.user;case"LOGOUT":backend.delete({url:"/logout"}).then(function(){return setTimeout(function(){return window.location.reload();},1500);}).catch(function(err){return alert(err);});return state;default:return state;}},USER_STORE={ACTIONS:ACTIONS,REDUCER:REDUCER};export{USER_STORE};
